oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Prairie Ramblers, Pepper Hawthorne and Chitlin' Switch Chirpers - WLS Barn Dance performances - 1942-02-15
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Home recorded Prairie Ramblers, Pepper Hawthorne, and Chitlin' Switch Chirpers performances, as performed on the February 15, 1942 Barn Dance show on radio station WLS (Chicago, IL).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Prairie Ramblers; Pepper Hawthorne; Chitlin' Switch Chirpers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: There's No Place For The Devil In My Home (Prairie Ramblers) (incomplete) -- [Unidentified] talks -- [Unidentified song] (Prairie Ramblers) -- [Unidentified] introduces Red Foley, Prairie Ramblers, and Pepper Hawthorne -- Cowboy Rangerette (Prairie Ramblers and Pepper Hawthorne) -- Jack Brinker advertises Charm Kurl -- [Unidentified song] (Prairie Ramblers) -- [Unidentified] introduces the Chitlin' Switch Chirpers -- Chitlin' Switch Chirpers talk -- [Unidentified song] (Chitlin' Switch Chirpers) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WLS (Radio station : Chicago, Ill.); Prairie Ramblers; Pepper Hawthorne; Chitlin' Switch Chirpers
